required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Large-Scale Metabolomic Profiling for the Diagnosis of Inborn Errors of Metabolism
clinical_study.official_title: Large-Scale Metabolomic Profiling for the Diagnosis of Inborn Errors of Metabolism

collaborator.agency: National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke (NINDS)

brief_summary.textblock: Researchers are trying to determine the efficacy of a global metabolomic approach in testing for and diagnosing inborn errors of metabolism as opposed to traditional testing methods.

detailed_description.textblock: Residual samples will be tested for a variety of biomarkers that may lead to better understanding of these disorders and help develop treatment options.

primary_outcome.measure: Quantify N-linked glycan intermediates in plasma and urine
primary_outcome.time_frame: length of study, up to 5 years
primary_outcome.description: Measure N-linked glycan intermediates in plasma and urine from PMM2-CDG patients.

primary_outcome.measure: Develop quantitative biomarkers for PGM1-CDG patients to monitor the efficacy of galactose therapy.
primary_outcome.time_frame: length of study, up to 5 years
primary_outcome.description: Measure the 41 plasma N-glycan levels in 9 PGM1-CDG patients before and after galactose therapy.

primary_outcome.measure: Develop quantitative biomarkers for SLC35A2-CDG patients and monitor galactose therapy efficacy.
primary_outcome.time_frame: length of study, up to 5 years
primary_outcome.description: Measure levels of plasma N-glycans from 10 SLC35A2-CDG patients before and after galactose therapy.

primary_outcome.measure: Validate biomarker to diagnose and follow NGLY1 deficiency and monitor N-acetylglucosamine (GlcNAc) therapy response.
primary_outcome.time_frame: length of study, up to 5 years
primary_outcome.description: Measure the level of Sia-Gal-GlcNAc-Asn biomarker excretion during GlCNAc therapy.

primary_outcome.measure: Validate novel diagnostic biomarkers for ALG13-CDG
primary_outcome.time_frame: length of study, up to 5 years
primary_outcome.description: Measure GlcNAc-Î²-Asn on glycoproteins in the cells from the already available fibroblast of 9 ALG13 patients.

biospec_descr.textblock: Stool, urine, DBS, fibroblasts, and blood can be retained for biomarker testing. DNA may be a part of this testing in the future.

study_pop.textblock: These individuals will likely have a congenital disorder of glycosylation or other metabolic disease.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- All individuals with specimens in Biochemical Genetics Laboratory and from patients collected under another IRB who have agreed to share samples/data
Exclusion Criteria:
- None

patient_data.ipd_description: Information and samples can be shared at PI's discretion.
